page.title: 17LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The nearest Magistrate's Court is at Mark Cross, in the parish of Rother_ field.A local doctor is a Justice of the Peace there and he plays an important role in law and hopefully deters further crime.The most common offences are careless driving and speeding, but assault, theft and other motoring offences are also dealt with. The age range of most people tried is between 19 & 20 _ 50% of these are unemployed.Really bad offences are referred to the High Courts in larger towns where they are tried by a jury. About 80 crimes are detected each week by the Police working 8 hour shifts daily. Their beat covers 215 sq. miles which is manned by 21 in Crowborough & 1 in Rotherfield.Crowborough Police Station was built in 1909.A traffic warden operates in Crowborough between 8a.m._6p.m daily except Sunday.
